topic: Research on Bias and Fairness in Text-to-Image Models

  entities:
    Eddie L Ungless|Researcher
    Björn Ross|Researcher
    Anne Lauscher|Researcher
    Abhipsa Basu|Researcher
    R Venkatesh Babu|Researcher

    Stable Diffusion|Model
    South Asia|Location

  proposition: Eddie L Ungless, Björn Ross, and Anne Lauscher studied stereotypes in text-to-image models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Eddie L Ungless|RESEARCHES|stereotypes
    Björn Ross|RESEARCHES|stereotypes
    Anne Lauscher|RESEARCHES|stereotypes

    entity-entity relationships:
    Eddie L Ungless|COLLABORATES_WITH|Björn Ross
    Eddie L Ungless|COLLABORATES_WITH|Anne Lauscher
    Björn Ross|COLLABORATES_WITH|Anne Lauscher

  proposition: The research examined misrepresentation of non-cisgender identities by text-to-image models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    text-to-image models|MISREPRESENTS|non-cisgender identities

  proposition: Abhipsa Basu, R Venkatesh Babu, and Danish Pruthi investigated geographical representativeness of images from text-to-image models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Abhipsa Basu|RESEARCHES|geographical representativeness
    R Venkatesh Babu|RESEARCHES|geographical representativeness
    Danish Pruthi|RESEARCHES|geographical representativeness

    entity-entity relationships:
    Abhipsa Basu|COLLABORATES_WITH|R Venkatesh Babu
    Abhipsa Basu|COLLABORATES_WITH|Danish Pruthi
    R Venkatesh Babu|COLLABORATES_WITH|Danish Pruthi

  proposition: Rida Qadri, Renee Shelby, Cynthia L Bennett, and Emily Denton conducted a community-centered study of text-to-image models in South Asia.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Rida Qadri|RESEARCHES|text-to-image models
    Renee Shelby|RESEARCHES|text-to-image models
    Cynthia L Bennett|RESEARCHES|text-to-image models
    Emily Denton|RESEARCHES|text-to-image models

    entity-entity relationships:
    Rida Qadri|COLLABORATES_WITH|Renee Shelby
    Rida Qadri|COLLABORATES_WITH|Cynthia L Bennett
    Rida Qadri|COLLABORATES_WITH|Emily Denton
    Renee Shelby|COLLABORATES_WITH|Cynthia L Bennett
    Renee Shelby|COLLABORATES_WITH|Emily Denton
    Cynthia L Bennett|COLLABORATES_WITH|Emily Denton
    Rida Qadri|STUDIES|South Asia
    Renee Shelby|STUDIES|South Asia
    Cynthia L Bennett|STUDIES|South Asia
    Emily Denton|STUDIES|South Asia

  proposition: Lukas Struppek and colleagues explored how cultural biases can be exploited via homoglyphs in text-to-image synthesis.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Lukas Struppek|RESEARCHES|cultural biases
    Lukas Struppek|RESEARCHES|homoglyphs

  proposition: Laura Gustafson and co-authors developed FACET, a fairness benchmark for computer vision evaluation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Laura Gustafson|DEVELOPS|FACET
    FACET|TYPE|fairness benchmark
    FACET|DOMAIN|computer vision

  proposition: Xudong Shen and colleagues researched finetuning text-to-image diffusion models for fairness.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Xudong Shen|RESEARCHES|finetuning
    Xudong Shen|RESEARCHES|fairness

  proposition: Nikita Nangia and colleagues created CrowS-pairs, a challenge dataset for measuring social biases in masked language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Nikita Nangia|CREATES|CrowS-pairs
    CrowS-pairs|TYPE|challenge dataset
    CrowS-pairs|PURPOSE|measuring social biases

  proposition: Moin Nadeem and researchers developed StereoSet for measuring stereotypical bias in pretrained language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Moin Nadeem|DEVELOPS|StereoSet
    StereoSet|PURPOSE|measuring stereotypical bias

  proposition: Alicia Parrish and team created BBQ, a hand-built bias benchmark for question answering.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Alicia Parrish|CREATES|BBQ
    BBQ|TYPE|bias benchmark
    BBQ|DOMAIN|question answering

  proposition: Han Liu and colleagues proposed RIATIG, a method for reliable and imperceptible adversarial text-to-image generation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Han Liu|PROPOSES|RIATIG
    RIATIG|TYPE|method
    RIATIG|PURPOSE|reliable and imperceptible adversarial text-to-image generation

  proposition: Xiaodong Wu and researchers studied robustness of watermarking on text-to-image diffusion models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Xiaodong Wu|RESEARCHES|watermarking robustness
    Xiaodong Wu|RESEARCHES|text-to-image diffusion models

  proposition: Haomin Zhuang and team conducted a pilot study on query-free adversarial attacks against Stable Diffusion.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Haomin Zhuang|CONDUCTS|pilot study
    Haomin Zhuang|STUDIES|query-free adversarial attacks
    Haomin Zhuang|TARGETS|Stable Diffusion
